name: i herd u liek water templs
name_original: i herd u liek water templs
description:
Push a crate onto the little star! Can't be that hard, right? There's even a wave machine to help you!

Use your head, but also your timing!

A short PuzzleScrupt game I made for GGJ 2017 to see how "real-time" I could make a PS game while keeping it SUkoban-like and fun.

7 levels total. The last one is a little frustrating ;-)

Controls

  • Left/A & Right/D: Move
  • Up/W & Down/S: To change the wave machine's amplitude
  • R to restart a level
